name: Gleam
summary:
A third-person single-player 3D platformer. 
A dark journey of an entity in search of light. Avoid deadly creatures, overcome your nightmares, and most important... don’t steer from the light.
storyline:
Listen to this story, the story of two brothers. One, a being of light and the other, of shadows. 
United into one, never parted and always alone. When the light rises, the shadows rests but takes the 
offensive. When the shadows awaken, the light takes the defensive. 
The desire of both? Be no longer attached to never feel loneliness again. A promised wish by an 
unknown entity, but at a price – glorms – small orange orbs that float in the light and shadow 
dimensions, to where they must venture against their own kin to get them all. When the glorm amount is 
met, the toll increases as the entity misses the most coveted glorms – their eyes.
